subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Some of the ailments of 2009 have already intruded into 2010, including the surgery on Carlos Beltran’s knee this month, hampering the Mets’ pursuit of a strong start.
snippet: Some of the ailments of 2009 have already intruded into 2010, including the surgery on Carlos Beltran’s knee this month, hampering the Mets’ pursuit of a strong start.
